tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Other Stages

definition.text: For the target rate, we can use the same principle as earlier: chart.at01hs.candle.close Use it for the formula!

paragraphs.text: For the target size, we should consider the following:
We wish to use all the USDT we obtained upon entering the position.
The exchange charges fees by subtracting from the asset we obtain on any given transaction.
Consider the above and pay a visit to the Trading Engine. Find the nodes that store the information we need and try to come up with a formula for the target size!
